translation: The evil-doers and the deluded, who are the lowest of men, do not seek Me; those whose knowledge is destroyed by illusion follow the ways of demons.
commentary: 7.15 Not not? Me to Me? evildoers evildoers? Fools the deluded? prapadyante seek? Naradhamah the lowest of men?,Maya by Maya? deprived of knowledge? asuram belonging to demons? Bhavam nature? dependents having taken to.Commentary These three kinds of people have no discrimination between right and wrong? the Real and the unreal. Do they commit murder? robbery? theft and other kinds of atrocious
